content.webTitle: Comedian Roseanne Barr on US politics and John McCain

fields.headline: Day two: Roseanne Barr - 'A nation run by old men on Viagra'
fields.bodyText: Roseanne Barr has lost none of the brilliance and sharp wit that made her sitcom Roseanne such a hugely successful and cutting edge portrayal of the struggles of an American working class family. Barr, who came out of the stand-up comedy world, was the show's matriarch throughout its nine year run on network television. She has now returned to the stand-up comedy circuit and progressive radio work. She has become politically active against the war in Iraq and as an advocate for ordinary working class Americans.
